m_szDocTitle: METHOD OF SETTING VIA-POINT IN NAVIGATION SYSTEM - HYUNDAI MOTOR COMPANY
m_szDocSumamry: Login Sign up Search Expert Search Quick Search Patents/Apps Non-Patent Literature SEARCH RESEARCH MPEP 2.0 TOOLS & RESOURCES ACCLAIM IP HELP Title: METHOD OF SETTING VIA-POINT IN NAVIGATION SYSTEM United States Patent Application 20150233723 Kind Code: A1 Abstract: The present disclosure relates to a method of setting a via-point in a navigation system. The method includes: inputting a plurality of starting places including a starting place of a driver and a starting place of a fellow passenger; when the starting place of the fellow passenger is selected as a via-point, searching for a route
